title: AHS Alumni Awards
text: We are immensely proud of our many accomplished alumni who are forging award-worthy careers in business, nonprofit, government and academia.
We honor several each year through the AHS Alumni Awards program:
Details on each award are below. Nominations can be made at any time.
Whenever possible, the college confers at least one award in each category. Award winners are recognized during AHS CELEBRATES in spring. Honorees must be present to receive their awards.
Associate Dean and Chair, Mrs. T.H. Chan Division of Occupational Science and Occupational Therapy, University of Southern California

Established in 1987, this is the highest honor bestowed upon alumni of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences (by the college’s current or former names). It is presented to alumni who have attained outstanding success and national or international distinction in their chosen profession or life’s work, and whose accomplishments reflect admirably on or bring honor to their alma mater.

This award is bestowed upon alumni of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences (by the college’s current or former names) who have made significant, notable and meritorious contributions, and who have consistently demonstrated exceptional loyalty, commitment, dedication and service to the college and/or one of its departments for the advancement of their alma mater.

UIC College of Applied Health Sciences alumni are a wide array of interesting and accomplished people. To celebrate, we honor up to two recent alumni (graduated within 10 years) whose careers and lives are on the rise.
Have questions about the AHS Alumni Awards program? Contact Keenan Cutsforth for help with submissions, details on AHS CELEBRATES and more.
